title: Nationals Take 2-0 Lead in the World Series
text:
HOUSTON—The Washington Nationals stormed into Houston as the biggest World Series underdogs in a dozen years. They left town two wins away from one of the least likely championships in baseball history.

In two games here at Minute Maid Park, the Nationals dismantled the best team in the major leagues by beating two of the sport’s most dominant pitchers on consecutive days. About 24 hours after handing Gerrit Cole his first defeat in in five months, the Nationals overcame Justin Verlander in an emphatic 12-3 victory Wednesday....
description: The Washington Nationals stormed into Houston as the biggest World Series underdogs in a dozen years. They left town two wins away from one of the least likely championships in baseball history.
